label: Parker Library MS 66 and Cambrige University Library MS FF.1.27: A Durham Manuscript Reconstructed
attribution: Images Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International Licenses. For higher resolution images suitable for scholarly or commercial publication, either in print or in an electronic format, please contact the Parker Library directly at parker-library@corpus.cam.ac.uk
description: A demonstration built for the 2019 IIIF conference to illustrate the possibility of reconstructing a manuscript which was split, and shuffled, over 400 years ago. Sections of the manuscript now reside in two different IIIF-compliant institutions.

metadata.label: Extent
metadata.value: ff. 165 Leaf height: 305 mm, width: 229 mm. Written height: 240 mm, width: 160 mm.

metadata.label: Current Physical Location
metadata.value: The Parker University, Corpus Christi College, Cambridge, and Cambridge University Library
